link_name: Template Net Cisco Small Business 1.3 and 1.4 SNMPv2
link_desc:
Introduction

This template is derived from my Cisco Small Business 2.4 SNMPv2

It is known to work with Zabbix server 4.4 and:

  • SRW2024-K9 running image 1.3.0.62.
  • SF300-24PP-K9 running image 1.4.2.4.
  • SG300-10PP-K9 and SRW2008-K9 running image 1.4.10.6.

Created by full clone of Cisco Small Business 2.4 SNMPv2 then:

  • Changed OIDs of Items:
    • System image
    • System product ID
    • System serial number

Installation

Administration > General > Macros: SNMP_COMMUNITY

Download the file (link below).

Configuration > Templates > Import > browse to the downloaded file > Import

Configure a host > Templates > Link new templates > search for Template Net Cisco Small Business 2.4 SNMPv2 > Add

After allowing time for discovery, Configuration > > Items > State: Not supported > Apply. Disable the unsupported items.

Bugs

  • No items for CPU
  • No items for fans
  • No items for memory
